teacher_info.intro: I have many interests and hobbies , such as playing basketball , playing pingpang , traveling , watching NBA . I am a supper fan of NBA . I went to America in March 2017 ,and stayed there for half a year. During this  half a year , I visited many places in America , like Texas, Utah, Los Angeles , Las Vegas, Yellow Stone National Park , Grand Canyon . I like to talk about many different topics , such as travel , sports , movies , food , festivals and so on .

I am a foreign trade sales. I have learned English from scratch to fluency. During this period, I have made a lot of mistakes and waste much time. Fortunately, I have found a systematic science learning method. I know that learning the language on the way to have a good teacher will be very helpful, it'll make your learning more efficient. So I come here want to help you to learn Chinese in a right way, save you time and your money.

我是一个外贸销售，自学英语从零开始到流利听说，这期间走了很多弯路，也有幸找到了系统科学的学习方法，我知道学习语言的路上有一个好的老师将会多么有帮助，可以让你的学习事半功倍。所以我来到这里想帮助你正确的学习中文，省钱省力。

Hi there, I’m Jennifer from Mainland China. Graduated as a Doctor of Philosophy in Education in Australia, I’m fully bilingual in Mandarin Chinese and English, plus proficient in teaching. I’m a big fan of movies, music, travelling, and delicious foods. I also love connecting with people from diverse cultural backgrounds.

P.S. Do you know that it’s better to practice Chinese every day for at least 15 mins, other than 2 hours once a week? Try to learn and practice more so that you can get improved faster.

HI, I am Amber
a responsible Chinese teacher with the most standard Mandarin. My goal is to teach every lesson of each student efficiently, I would like to see your improvement during our classes not only just spent time and money with nothing---that wastes both of our time.

CUSTOMIZED LESSON FOR EACH STUDENT 
I have big passion for collecting ideas always to improve my teaching skills and help my students improve quickly and effectively.

Believe in yourself and believe in me. Let`s rock & roll!
Looking forward to meeting you soon!~~

Hello, everyone! My name is Joshua Gao. I am from Suzhou, an eastern coastal city Near Shanghai. I study Sociology and Chinese language in universities and have a master's degree in Literature. I worked as a journalist for a local newspaper for six years, covering reports from politics, rural development to economical issues. Now I am a freelance writer and have traveled to  20 countries in the past three years.

我是一个喜欢学习语言，喜欢和别人分享有趣知识的人，个性开朗外向，爱好旅游，同时我也热衷美食和健身，目前正在学习英语和法语，如果你也有同样的爱好，欢迎和我分享您的有趣的故事哦。
Hi, I am Claire Yu, I am Chinese, I can speak Chinese, English, and French. In my mind, it's very important to speak with native speakers when it's your targeted language, and it will help you to imitate their accent and their gesture to communicate, also it will offer the chance to express yourself, be a speaker naturally with confidence. So, if you are looking for someone like this, I am here to waiting for you.

-      Chinese teacher in French university
-	Master of Teaching Chinese to Speakers of Other Languages(MTCSOL)
-       Former Confucius Institute teacher in United States
-	CTCSOL holder (Certifiate of Teaching Chinese to Speakers of Other Languages)

Master of education

香港弘立书院
The Independent Schools Foundation Academy

Hi everyone, my name is Sally. I obtained my bachelor degree in China and achieved my master degree from Cardiff university in the UK. I have taught Mandarin for over 3 years to a wide range of age groups from different countries around the world. Learning a second language is interesting and exceptionally wonderful. You will have opportunities to meet different people with various backgrounds and learn their cultures through pleasant conversations. This is why I am so passionate about teaching and learning languages.

●  Professional and experienced Mandarin teacher to speakers of other languages.
    专业而有经验的对外汉语教师
●  5 years experience teaching English in Chinese public middle school
    五年公立中学英语老师
● Author of three published Chinese novels with pen name: 莫利清华 
   出版了三部中文长篇小说。可在线搜索《我只要爱情》《花落花开》《丁克式婚姻》。笔名：莫利清华
● 2 years  supervisor of translation department and senior translator in one Shanghai going abroad service company 
   出国服务公司翻译部主管兼资深翻译
● Graduated from Shanghai International Studies University, bachelor’s degree 
   上海外国语大学英语语言文学学士
● Earned IPA Certificate：Senior Chinese Language Teacher
   证书：IPA国际注册高级对外汉语教师
● I live in Shanghai, China, with my American husband and our son
   目前与美国先生和我们的儿子定居上海

Hello，I’m Jane, I was born and grew up in Guangdong province. So I can speak both Mandarin and Cantonese fluently. My English is around B2 to C1. And I am now studying German. Because I am fascinated by German culture recently. Learning a new language takes a lot of efforts. It is both fun and hard. But when I look back and see all the improvements I made, I think all my efforts are worthwhile. I hope you can enjoy your Chinese studying journey too.

Hello, I'm Sunny from China, which by the way is very amazing. I am very happy to be friends with you. I am a bright person  and I enjoy life very much, I like communicating with friends and cooking delicious foods.(Did you notice that all the food in China are very yummy, book my class, and I can tell you how to cook some of them)

Hi everyone!

My name's Hannah. I am a professional native speaking Mandarin teacher from northeast of China and I speak standard Mandarin.

I graduated with a dual major in English and Japanese language. After graduating I became an IT supporter in a Brazilian outsourcing company.

Started from 2014, I have been tutoring Mandarin online for more than five years and two years on ITALKI with over 4700 lessons. 

My students are the greatest and I am passionate about helping them achieve their Mandarin learning goals.

Hi, I'm Alice. My Chinese name is Xiuxia. I'm from China, now living in the UK.  I'm accredited with a Celta and a certificate of Teaching Chinese to Speakers of other languages, as well as a bachelors degree in teaching.

Hello, I'm Emma. I'm 24 years old. I'm a native Chinese speaker and I can speak fluently in English. I graduated from the Glasgow School of Art in 2018 and I'm currently working as a graphic designer in Shanghai. The things I really enjoy doing are taking photos, watching movies, and playing Nintendo.

大家好！我的中文名字叫灿灿。“灿”字，在汉语里是光彩、明亮的意思。我喜欢中国的传统文化：汉服、旗袍、中国古典舞和古典乐曲；同时，我也喜欢学习语言、读书、旅游。中国文化丰富多彩，而汉语就是打开这个多彩世界的一把钥匙。在这里，我非常乐意帮您掌握这把钥匙，去打开一扇门，感受中国传统文化的魅力。
Hi, everyone. My Chinese name is cancan which means bright and shine. I'm so interested in Chinese cultures and traditions such as han-style clothes, Qipao, Chinese classical dance and music. Meanwhile I'm also interested in reading, traveling and language studying. Learn to speak Chinese is the key to understand Chinese culture which is so interesting. I'm really happy to help you master  Chinese and enjoy the charm of Chinese culture.

Hi  there, this is Cara , I'm a  native Chinese speaker. I speak English fluently and am currently learning Korean . Given that I am a language learner myself, I understand the challenges that my students who are in different level faces, and I always share my study methods to them.

I worked for Shanghai  Astrazeneca pharmaceutical company, it's a TOP 500  company in medical industry , so I am familiar with Business Chinese, and I understand diffrent country culture well.

Hello, my name is LIN CANHUA, you can call me Cancan ( which pronounce tsantsan)，I come from a ，beautiful city in the south of china -Guangzhou, so I also speak Cantonese and Teochew, since 2010, I learn French at university and I work and live in France now, I like discover different culture so I travel a lot.  本人性格非常外向，非常喜欢与人交谈，同时，我也非常喜欢户外活动，旅游和电影，对各国文化都抱有强烈的好奇心。Je suis une personne avec l'esprit ouvert, et je m'intéresse beaucoup aux différentes cultures.

Hello, everyone. I'm Jerry from Taiwan. I went to an international university majored in Journalism and Mass Communication (English Program) so I speak English fluently. I got my DELE certificate and went to Latin America to work as a GIS project assistant after graduating from college. I've also been working as an interpreter/translator of three languages(English, Chinese and Spanish)
I am an outgoing person who likes to travel and make new friends. I enjoy learning new languages and also helping other people do it.

想要學西班牙文的朋友可以直接私訊我詢問，或者直接跟我訂閱體驗課程來讓我來測驗你的程度。

http://tinyurl.com/yamagasi
I love learning languages. It's interesting to have a conversation with foreigners in their native language. Actually, one of my life goals is to speak more than six languages. In my spare time I also like playing the guitar and piano. My personality is quite easy-going and humorous, so it's very easy for me to make friends.
